sentences.sentence: Duly mete out rewards and punishments.
It may make it more difficult for defendants and their boards to mete out punishments.
sentences.translation: 对被告银行及其的董事的量刑将更加困难。

sentences.sentence: An algorithm will mete out the offers by weighing customers' past purchases and geographic locations.
sentences.translation: 分配订单的算法结合了客户的购物历史和地理位置。
